title: Bill Arkwright Joins Solutions 2 GO LLC As Vice President Of Sales
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Solutions 2 GO LLC 
IRVINE, Calif., Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Solutions 2 GO LLC, with corporate offices in Irvine, CA, is pleased to announce that Bill Arkwright has joined the organization as Vice President of Sales - US. In this role, he will be responsible for the development of the company's brick and mortar retail business. Bill brings a wealth of experience from a variety of top tier game companies like Konami, Mattel, and Microsoft. His most recent position as Director of Sales: US distribution for Microsoft put him in a unique position to understand the key issues and opportunities affecting retail and work closely with top retail executives to devise and implement solutions to grow their mutual business. 
(Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278931 ) 
"I've worked with Bill for over twenty years", said Nima Taghavi, CEO of Solutions 2 GO LLC, "and am excited to have his energy and creativity working on behalf of Solutions 2 GO". "Our retailer and brand partners' business continues to become more complex with digital, ecommerce, as well as brick and mortar strategies competing for resources and attention. Solutions 2 GO partners with our customers to deliver services in specific areas of their business, augmenting their ability to create maximum value from all components of their business. With years of experience and deep customer relationships, I believe that Bill is the perfect executive to lead our efforts in this important segment of the marketplace". 
"I'm excited to be joining Solutions 2 GO LLC, at this point in the company's development", said Bill Arkwright. " Our company's investments in state of the art distribution facilities and systems, combined with a proven track record of developing and implementing exclusive and compelling promotional concepts, puts us in a unique position to be more than just a logistics partner. We have the desire and capability to be a turnkey, full service solution in the video game hardware, software and accessories business bringing strategic and tactical plans to the marketplace with the capability to implement them with excellence. The video game business has never been more competitive or diverse than it is today and I'm looking forward to leveraging the full resources of Solutions 2 GO, to create reliable, impactful, and long-term value for our retailer and brand partners". 
About Solutions 2 GO LLC 
Based in Orange County, California, Solutions 2 GO, LLC (USA) is a privately held video game distribution company which provides value-added sales, marketing, and logistics solutions to its customers and brand partners. 
Media Contact: Mika Kelly, Clever Communications, 408-693-0176, mika@clevercomm.com
